summary: The year is 1965. Rachel Brener is one of 3 young Mossad agents team who caught "The Surgeon of Birkenau" - a Nazi monster who was never brought to trial in Israel. The official reason was ... See full summary »
cast: Gila Almagor|Neta Garty|Edgar Selge|Itay Tiran|Yehezkel Lazarov|Oded Teomi|Alexander Peleg|Eli Cohen|Eran Ivanir|Alon Zamek|Nadav Netz|Edith Naman|Reut Hajaj|Viktor Stepanenko|Elena Sikorskaya|Victoria Malektorovych|Oleg Drach|Yuriy Chepurnov|Vlad Levitskyy|Aleksandr Kulish|Sergey Strelnikov|Sergey Dvoretskiy|Aleksandra Smolyarova|Sergey Malyuga|Evgeniya Gladiy|Dmitriy Sova
title: The Debt
